Class Travel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.IS1220.myVelib.app.Travel

    This class represents a planned ride.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Travel

        public Travel(User user,
              Localization source,
              Localization destination)
        Constructor of the class Travel, called automatically when using method User.planRide(). The default PathStrategy is MinimalWalking.
        Parameters:
        user - a User object
        source - a Localization corresponding to the start point
        destination - a Localization corresponding to the end point

        destination - a Localization corresponding to the end point
        pathStrategy - the PathStrategy to apply
        bicycleType - a String corresponding to the type of bicycle wanted

              Localization source,

              java.lang.String bicycleType)
        Constructor of the class Travel, called automatically when using method User.planRide(). The user can specify a type of bicycle. The default PathStrategy is MinimalWalking.
        Parameters:
        user - a User object
        source - a Localization corresponding to the start point
        destination - a Localization corresponding to the end point
        bicycleType - a String corresponding to the type of bicycle wanted

    • Method Detail

      • findRide

        public void findRide()
        This method calculates a ride from the Localization source to the Localization destination using a given PathStrategy. More precisely, it computes a start Station and an end Station, the duration and the cost of the ride, taking into account the type of subscription of the user.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is automatically called whenever either the end station or the start station undergo any change in status. A new ride is calculated, with the associated duration and cost. If the user has already picked up their bicycle, then only the end station is updated.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
